DOC.brief_summary: The design of this study will enable an extensive evaluation of safety, tolerability, and PK-PD relationship following 4 weeks of dosing in patients with Coronary heart Disease
DOC.brief_title: Safety, Tolerability, Pharmacokinetics and Pharmacodynamics of APL180
